Outdoor cushion: When you go camping or spend your time outside, you can use a pillow as a cushion and pillow for your seat.
Support pillow: It can be used as a back support when sitting for a long time, such as on a couch, car seat, or while working at your desk.
Doorstopper: For some who don't have a proper doorstopper, they can use a pillow to make sure their door stays closed.
Neck pillow: Use your pillow as a neck pillow by rolling it up or folding it and tie with a string or shoelace.
Floor cushion: When friends or family come over and don't have enough seating, you can use the pillow as a floor cushion.
